value.fullName: 1. Very little impact on the project.
value.label: 1. Very little impact on the project.

value.fullName: 2. Impact will have small change in the project outcome.
value.label: 2. Impact will have small change in the project outcome.

value.fullName: 3. Event will cause some impact to the project; project can be completed with minimal budget, schedule changes, etc.
value.label: 3. Event will cause some impact to the project; project can be completed with minimal budget, schedule changes, etc.

value.fullName: 4. An event will have a major impact to the project; can complete project but may be over budget, schedule, etc.
value.label: 4. An event will have a major impact to the project; can complete project but may be over budget, schedule, etc.

value.fullName: 5. Very high impact including financial loss, personal injury, termination of contract, loss of client, etc.
value.label: 5. Very high impact including financial loss, personal injury, termination of contract, loss of client, etc.
